name: Viva La Marshmallow!
description:
Choose your favorite marshmallow, the pink or the white and fight against other marshmallows in a 2:00 minute time limit arena battle.

There are 32 different levels which you have to wander trough and push other marshmallows into the burning fire wandering around the screen. Some of the marshmallows have weapons so be aware!

You have two minutes to complete each stage or "Pury" the big fire will chase you to death!

Choose either the Easier 8 Levels of "Bearland Boulevard" or the harder 8 Levels of "Kunievski Crossroad", the Messiest icy levels of "Schienberg Spring-yard", and "Elbuzz Alleyway" which is an 8 electricity themed levels, and enjoy an action packed arcade with outstanding end results either for a white or a pink marshmallow!

Wander around the levels with arrow keys and push your foes with Ctrl as a default key!
